__e: Now I'll be court-martialed because of him...
If a court-martial is the only way to let the people of the Federation know what is happening here, I welcome it.
I don't want nobody risking a court-martial for me.
Four hours ago you could have had him court-martialled and sent me to a labour camp, not now.
The city was under martial law, and i was the head of the military police.
They court-martial our captain and didn't mention all of our dead?
